Configuration.Name: Remote Help
Configuration.Author: Dennis Grzegorzewski, Paul V. Galvin Libary, Illinois Institute of Technology, grzegozewski@iit.edu
Configuration.Description: Creates a tab labeled Remote Help on the ILLiad main form that creates a browser to display a web page that lists all the processes in the Interlibrary Loan department that can be accomplished remotely.

Setting.name: Help Location
Setting.Description: Location of Help pages on local file server
